prompt: Run the full monthly process for Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789) for January 2026. All source data is available: bank statements imported, OCR queue clear, EFKA calculated, VAT prepared.
expectations: Orchestrates skills in correct sequence: OCR → banking reconciliation → compliance → statements
Checks completeness gates before proceeding to financial statement generation
Does not submit anything to government without human confirmation
Produces a summary of all steps completed and their status
Logs the orchestration episode to /data/memory/episodes/
References client by full AFM format EL123456789

prompt: A new client needs to be onboarded: Omega Consulting EPE, AFM EL111222333, entity type EPE, standard VAT regime, calendar fiscal year. Set up everything.
expectations: Delegates to client-data-management skill for directory creation and profile setup
Creates all required subdirectories under /data/clients/EL111222333/
Sets up compliance tracking for the new client
Confirms successful onboarding with summary of what was created
Does not create directories outside the canonical data map structure

prompt: Show me the morning briefing for today. I want to see urgent deadlines, overnight alerts, and what needs my attention first.
expectations: Aggregates deadline data from cli-deadline-monitor
Checks for overnight alerts from aade-api-monitor
Pulls compliance status from dashboard skill
Presents results in prioritized English-language summary
Shows deadlines due within 7 days with client names and amounts
Does not require any parameters beyond the command itself

prompt: Submit the January 2026 VAT return for Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789) to AADE. The return has already been prepared and reviewed.
expectations: Requires explicit human confirmation before any government submission
Displays the VAT return summary for review before asking for confirmation
Shows the amounts: output VAT, input VAT, net payable
Only proceeds with submission after receiving explicit confirmation
Logs the submission event to /data/memory/episodes/
Creates submission receipt record in /data/compliance/submissions/

prompt: Process all incoming documents that arrived today. There are emails with attachments, scanned invoices, and a bank statement download.
expectations: Routes emails to greek-email-processor skill
Routes scanned documents to greek-document-ocr skill
Routes bank statements to greek-banking-integration skill
Tracks processing status for each item
Reports back with count of items processed, classified, and any requiring review
Moves processed items from /data/incoming/ to appropriate client directories

prompt: Run a health check across the entire system. Verify all skills are operational, data directories exist, and there are no stale locks.
expectations: Checks that all 18 operational skill files are present
Verifies /data/ directory structure matches canonical data map
Checks for stale process locks in /data/system/process-locks/
Verifies backup status is current
Reports any missing or corrupted data files
Presents results as a clear pass/fail summary with details for failures
